title: Kreiz Says Mattel Anticipated Supply Chain Issues
itunes:title: Kreiz Says Mattel Anticipated Supply Chain Issues
description:
Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz discusses quarterly earnings and how the toy company has been able to work through supply chain challenges.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
